author: John Bowden
title: CDC director: Agency sent guidance to Florida weeks before gov ordered some residents to stay at home
description: National health officials say they sent Florida-specific coronavirus guidance specific to the state weeks before Gov. Ron DeSantis (R) advised residents to stay at home.Dr. Robert Redfield, director of the Centers...
